price: Al-Ƙur’ān (tí A sọ̀kalẹ̀ pẹ̀lú) èdè Lárúbáwá, èyí tí ọ̀rọ̀ inú rẹ̀ kò dojú rú nítorí kí wọ́n lè bẹ̀rù (Allāhu).
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
